A messy book of notes / Meu bloco de notas sobre tudo Henrique Castro Martins (hcm@iag.puc-rio.br) 2021-02-08 1 Book of notes This is a collection of random notes that I am continually updating using Markdown. The primary purpose is to make online stuff that is important in my classes, projects, or articles. You may consult here searching for references, project ideas, and some codes that I used eventually. You may consult a bunch of other stuff in https://henriquemartins.net/. I hope you find it useful. Thanks for passing by! Vou misturar Português e Inglês. Some notes are in English, others in Portuguese.
